page.title: 11Street Life
page.content: People who live on the streets have very hard lives.There are thousands of people on the waiting list for a place to live in Tower Hamlets.Most tramps go hungry and die of hunger.They have to look for scraps to eat in dustbins.My mum's friend has 2 rows of empty flats below her.They have been empty for 3 months,can't they put at least 2 or 3 people in them?Tramps sleep in the streets because they have no place to stay.Some sleep in beds without mattresses,just the springs.Some sleep on the pavement with cardboard boxes on them or old newspapers. Michelle McQueen(9)
